replies.text:
​ @михаиликкозлов  
 Trixie got from her mother a special (one use only) ability to "swap places" with antone who were to deal FATAL damage to her.
  -> The fusion of Trixie & Twilight [Flawless] has a "variant" of this same ability, but for LETHAL magical attacks.
  
 |  
  
The reason Trixie ended up in the yellowgreen clothes of her sister Marionette, is because she swapped places with her when the tip of the knife touched her head (but before it penetrated the brain, causing FATAL damage).
  
|  
  
The reason Tricie got wings (a "pegacorn", but NOT a powerful "alicorn"); is because she altered reality (using tje combination of her "death" & the mystical connection she has with Luna's dream powers to do that minor miracle).

replies.text: Yeah Mary saw herself as delivering justice, blaming the world for her mother’s suffering and wanted to undo it all. While she wasn’t wrong that awful ponies like Jackpot exist, she let bitterness blind her to the fact that not all are the same. That anger made her easy prey for Flawless, who used and discarded her, ironically repeating her mother’s fate. The world of My Little Pony is a dark place, but Mary is also a weird little pony so who knows where her story may lead from here? There just might be a little twinkle at the end of the tunnel for her too!

replies.text:
Celestia explained that Luna had a "rescue bike" at the extraction point (with capacity for 4 ponies).
  
The idea was to take out Wallflower Blush & the 3 unicorns (Twilight, Twilight's Brother & Twilight's wife).
   The guide (Chrysalis), the pegasus (Derpy) & the earthpony (Suri) were ment to to either die or get lost/trapped in the ice planet. 
  
|  
Since Mary managed to stole Wallflower's heart, there was no need to take tgat green pony mare to Equestria.
  -> Mary went back the same way she arrived (unknown means).
  |  
Because Twilight & Trixie came back in the rocket (it runs on unicorn magic, with Wallflower's antimagic field no longer active it could do it); then only 4 need Luna's bike: Chrysalis, Sining, Derpy & Suri.

text: This series meant so much to me. I grew up with MLP fan content since I was in elementary school. I literally had a freeze frame from RDP by Dawn Somewhere as my iPod screen saver. However, as I grew up I had to watch not only the MLP fandom all fandoms in general fall off in popularity and become more obscure on youtube. You breathing life back into the MLP fandom and it getting enough traction to have reached my home page is a truly incredible accomplishment and it brings back my hope. The hope that generations far after our own will experience the beauty of fandoms and creativity of fan made content. I would not be who I am without autistic masterpieces like this one. Please watch Dawn Somewhere's "Who is the Joke On?". I think he kind of puts into perspective the accomplishment of what you've done with this series in 2025. In short, thanks bro.

text:
Flawless spent sooo much time trying not to squint her near sighted eyes😂

24:11 25:44 26:11 Intense staring while probably being affected by intense light stimulation

24:00 24:57 34:10 going back to squint

26:47 26:55 27:05 27:11 the moments where everything one once know breaks down

21:47 23:03 24:53 25:08 25:24 25:55 Those struggles with individuality, these emptiness, those unspoken pain in Marionette. And we see how those leave traces and effects on Flawless and completes her thoughts.

27:47 29:45 31:15 all those painful windows of shattered soul (expression of CPTSD and ASD may may overlap in some way but with proper training it would be fine. But 21:27 how good she's pressing in everything with that kind of peace and stability)

Thank you SOOOOOO MUCH for capturing those eye looks. Got me crying so hard while intensively swallowing my tears. (Sorry that was a lot the time stamps may mess up)

32:54 that deformed self imagine while reframing story telling (self healing and shifts in cognition) 

35:46 WHAT IS SHE SEEING!!! THAT NEW HEART IN ONE WHOLE PIECE!!!

God Tamers thank you for giving us that another piece of bloody courage to keep masking for another day.

Then all the way back to 2:03 the unburdened and zoned out, and all those info rushing underneath those masks. Another day another chance of peace.

text:
(2:48) Trixie & Luna matching outfit is just adorable

(4:13) No words can explain how perfectly executed this joke was🤣🤣🤣

(21:42) OK WHHAAASSAAAYTTT???  I DID NOT SEE THIS COMING but it does make sense thinking back to certain moments of PEAK FORESHADOWING! The clues/hints were there but it was still hard to predict the reveal. Simply amazing👏

(23:48) EVERYONE SHUT UP! Bestpony has arrived!!!

(32:55) Never in a million years would’ve expected Trixie to become an eldritch God but FUCK YEAH. And her conversation with Twilight is just peak romance😭❤️ 

(35:32) Glad Flawless is officially part of the family now. She’s such an adorable filly now that I almost can’t believe she was threatening to kill & destroy everyone only a few movies ago☠️

(41:36) WOOOOO YEAHH BABY THIS IS WHAT IVE BEEN WAITING FOR!! She’s officially officially accepted into the fam🎉🥳🎉🥳🎉

(42:04) And thank you for making this masterpiece for us❤️‍🔥. This is hands down my fav movie so ever, despite me lacking some context(for Starlight as an example). 

All jokes aside(legal & morally questionable alike), you are a phenomenal creator. The way you write the cast & boldly utilize concepts condemned by society needs to be studied and I WILL study it! 

Once again, thank you Tamers for being here even after your cancellation🥹

text: The tragic irony of the way Mary dies is not lost on me. She did her conquest to resurrect her mother and get revenge on Trixie, but in the end, she was killed by a spell cast by her mother to protect Trixie. It's both brilliantly executed and heartbreaking. Overall, this video - especially the latter half - is compelling in a way to me that I wasn't expecting, with a very mature story structure. Well done. 🦄

text: Ok im trying to understand what happened as I watch the newer episodes. But why exactly in the moment the mom spell went off was trixie able to erase reality? And why I just don’t understand that bit. In the newer episodes it also mentions she rewrote history so certain stuff is different but why did she erase stuff to begin with.
author: @CallMeSwiper

replies.text: Trixie is just a unique pony. When she was born she ended up stealing her own sisters magic which left her with two magic sources inside of her. That made her and her sister a paradox. One (Marionette) lacks a soul and therefore doesn't need to follow the rules of reality. The other (trixie) carries two, so she can also do the same. Trixie didn't even know she could and it subconsciously happened when her desires to keep Twilight safe by erase Marionette kicked in. But Trixie went to far and ended up erasing everything but Twilight.
replies.author: @Tamers12345Official

replies.text:
thanks for taking the time to explain! 

So trixie is pegacorn of everything able to erase and rewrite because she’s anomaly itself 

And sorin is a pegacorn of nothingness able to undo and choose the timeline he wants to reside in. 

Am I on the right track ?
replies.author: @CallMeSwiper

replies.text: @CallMeSwiper  Close, but Soarin isn't a pegacorn, he's a synthetic alicorn(not too dissimilar to Scootaloo after swapping eyes with Sweetie Belle) as he got access to alicorn powers through a magic book, and not a natural ascension. Trixie and her sister are the only living pegacorns in equestria and the limits to what exactly they can/can't are unclear because they've only just gained access to it.
